According to the provided knowledge base, **the legal age of criminal responsibility in Singapore is 14 years old**.  This means that a person under 14 years old cannot be held criminally responsible for their actions. However, if they commit an offense against someone who is below 14 years old, then the punishment will increase to five years imprisonment and caning ##7$$.
